    <meta name="DC.title" content="London Fire Brigade - Home" />
    <meta name="DCTERMS.alternative" content="Home" />
    <meta name="DCTERMS.created" scheme="DCTERMS.W3CDTF" content="2008-04-30" />
    <meta name="DCTERMS.modified" scheme="DCTERMS.W3CDTF" content="2015-04-02" />

    <meta name="description" content="London’s fire and rescue service is the busiest in the country and one of the largest firefighting and rescue organisations in the world." />
    <script type="text/javascript" defer="defer">
//<![CDATA[
        function newWin_addEvent(obj, type, fn) {
            if (obj.attachEvent) {
                obj['e' + type + fn] = fn;
                obj[type + fn] = function() { obj['e'+type+fn](window.event); }
                obj.attachEvent('on' + type, obj[type + fn]);
            } else
                obj.addEventListener(type, fn, false);
        }
        function newWinLinks(){
            var thishost = location.hostname;
            var links = document.getElementsByTagName('A');
            for(i=0;i<links.length;i++){
                if(links[i].rel!='media'){
                    linkHostname = links[i].hostname.substr(0, links[i].hostname.indexOf(':'));
                    if(linkHostname==''){
                      linkHostname=links[i].hostname;
                    }
                    if(links[i].rel!='media'){
                        if(linkHostname==''){
                            continue;
                        }else if(linkHostname==thishost){
                            continue;
                        }else if(links[i].protocol=='mailto:'){
                            continue;
                        }
                        
                        

                    }
                }
                
                links[i].target='_blank';
                if(links[i].title!=''){
                    links[i].title += ' (opens in a new window)';
                }else{
                    links[i].title = 'opens in a new window';
                }
                if(links[i].getElementsByTagName("IMG").length<=0){

                var img = document.createElement("img");
                 
                img.setAttribute("src", "/Style/Images/new-win-icon.gif");
                 
                img.setAttribute("alt", "(opens in a new window)");
                 
                links[i].appendChild(img);
                }
            }
        }
        newWin_addEvent(window, 'load', newWinLinks);
    //]]>
    </script>
  </head><!-- /// Start of document body /// -->
